title: #对错
txt_content:
#条件制约
summon area_effect_cloud ~ ~ ~ {Tags:["1"]}
scoreboard objectives add 1score dummy
scoreboard players set 1 @e[tag=1] 0
stats entity @e[tag=1] set SuccessCount @e[tag=1] 1
#天降正义
scoreboard players tag @a add A1 {SelectedItem:{id:minecraft:blaze_rod ,tag:{display:{Name:"天降正义!!~"},Lore:["拿在手上发动技能"]}}} 
execute @e[tag=1] ~ ~ ~ execute @a[tag=A1] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[c=1] ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~7 ~ minecraft:air * tp @s @e[c=1]
execute @a[score_1score_min=1] ~ ~ ~ summon tnt ~ ~ ~

replies.txt_content:
已找到错误
 scoreboard players set 1 @e[tag=1] 0
